metadata.title: CVE-2021-47407 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Compliant (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:KVM: x86: Handle SRCU initialization failure during page track initCheck the return of init_srcu_struct(), which can fail due to OOM, wheninitializing the page track mechanism.  Lack of checking leads to a NULLpointer deref found by a modified syzkaller.[Move the call towards the beginning of kvm_arch_init_vm. - Paolo]

criterions.comment: linux-fips package in fips-updates/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
linux-aws-fips package in fips-updates/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
linux-azure-fips package in fips-updates/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
linux-gcp-fips package in fips-updates/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
